message.content:
1. Fasting plasma glucose was determined at baseline and end of treatment.
2. Postprandial plasma glucose was determined at baseline and end of treatment.
3. Insulin sensitivity was determined at baseline and end of treatment.
4. Glycosylated haemoglobin (HBA1c) was determined at baseline and end of treatment.
5. 24-hour mean systolic blood pressure was determined at baseline and end of treatment.
6. 24-hour mean diastolic blood pressure was determined at baseline and end of treatment.

messages.content:
Statement: At baseline and end of treatment, fasting and postprandial plasma glucose, insulin sensitivity, glycosylated haemoglobin (HBA1c) and 24-hour mean systolic and diastolic blood pressures were determined.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
